content: this beanie style hat is knit utilizing slip stitches creating a subtle all over texture and making it an easy project slipping every other stitch on alternate rounds speeds you along the slip_stitch creates a scrunchy and warm hat the texture adds just enough interest that s suitable for male and female wearers unlike i slipped up - the original child size pattern 1 which had a plain top this hat continues the slip_stitch pattern all the way to the top of the hat 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/i-slipped-up
